name: Chronic Subdural Hematoma with Delirium
chief_complaint: I've been feeling confused and my head hurts, especially when I stand up
physical_findings: mild pronator drift on left side

lab_results.CT head: crescent-shaped hypodensity over right hemisphere with midline shift

prognosis: Guarded - depends on timely intervention and pre-existing cognitive status. Full recovery possible with treatment but risk of recurrence remains.
description: A slowly accumulating blood collection between the dura and arachnoid membranes, often following minor head trauma in elderly patients. The brain atrophy in aging allows larger collections before symptoms appear. Delirium results from mass effect and altered cerebral metabolism.
